code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with progressive Kidney for past 6 days. pt is a female retired aged 79 years. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 70 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.

s:pt presents with 3 months history of Kidney. she is a 79 yo f. o:Height 70 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
